title: Form Timeline Performance Tab
description: Track form submission timelines and compliance across all cases

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: The Form Timeline Performance tab provides a comprehensive view of all legal form submissions across your cases, helping you monitor submission timelines, identify delays, and ensure compliance with filing deadlines.

content.title: Form Tracking
content.description: Monitor all form submissions (ASMT-10, ASMT-12, DRC-01, GSTAT, etc.) across cases with submission and due dates

content.title: Timeline Compliance
content.description: Track whether forms were submitted on time, delayed, or are still pending with RAG status indicators

content.title: Performance Metrics
content.description: View days elapsed since submission or until due date to identify bottlenecks

content.title: Advanced Filtering
content.description: Filter by form type, timeline status, RAG status, client, case, and date range

content.title: Export Capabilities
content.description: Export form timeline reports to Excel or PDF for stakeholder review
The unique identifier for the form template (e.g., ASMT10_REPLY, DRC01_REPLY)
Full name of the legal form
Current litigation stage when form was/is to be submitted
Actual date when the form was submitted (blank if pending)
On Time (submitted before due date), Delayed (submitted after due date), or Pending (not yet submitted)
Number of days between submission and due date (positive = early, negative = late)
Red-Amber-Green indicator: Green (on time/early), Amber (approaching deadline), Red (overdue/delayed)

sections.heading: Using Filters
sections.content:
Use the filter rail on the left to narrow down form submissions:

• **Form Type**: Select specific form templates (ASMT-10, ASMT-12, DRC-01, etc.)
• **Timeline Status**: Filter by On Time, Delayed, or Pending submissions
• **RAG Status**: Show only Green, Amber, or Red status forms
• **Date Range**: Focus on forms due or submitted within specific date ranges
• **Client/Case**: Filter by specific clients or cases

Apply multiple filters simultaneously for precise analysis.

content.tip: Review this report weekly to identify pending forms and approaching deadlines
Prioritize forms showing Amber or Red RAG status to avoid compliance breaches
Use the Days Elapsed metric to identify stages or form types that consistently face delays
Export client-specific reports to provide transparency on form submission timelines
Analyze patterns in delayed submissions to optimize internal workflows

sections.heading: Common Use Cases
content: Generate monthly compliance reports showing all forms submitted on time vs. delayed
Identify cases with pending form submissions approaching deadlines
Analyze performance by form type to identify problematic templates or processes
Track team/individual performance on form submission timeliness
Provide clients with detailed reports on their case progress and compliance status
